name: Super Excitebike
description:
Fan made clone of Excitebike for the NES, my version includes Mario Kart items.
Powered by my 2DR engine for JavaScript with sprite support.

Press 1 to start or restart a random singleplayer game.
Press 2 to start or restart a random a multiplayer game.

P1 move with WASD
Turbo: J
Gas: K
Item: L

P2 move with arrow keys
Turbo: /?
Gas: . >
Item: , <
